issue.title: edgetag.io CNAME tracking servers
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [x] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

4.11.27

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed analytics or tracker

### Which browser(s) do you use?

other (specify in comment below)

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://clearstem.com

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter

### Privacy

AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, EasyPrivacy, Legitimate URL Shortener, Fanboy's Anti-Facebook List

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

_No response_

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

customers.edgetag.io
fallback.attntags.com

These are the main endpoints, often used as CNAME. It's being used by many websites. Here's some examples,

https://clearstem.com
kqefj.clearstem.com --> fallback.attntags.com
lftce.clearstem.com --> lftce.customers.edgetag.io

https://lapolicegear.com
hbpvm.lapolicegear.com

And a list of 142 domains I found that point to this CNAME (if you'd like to add as Individual cname tracking system):

edgetag servers

### Privacy

- [x] I agree to follow this condition
